KSGenDirectionSurfaceCompositeBuilder.h
1 #ifndef Kassiopeia_KSGenDirectionSurfaceCompositeBuilder_h_
2 #define Kassiopeia_KSGenDirectionSurfaceCompositeBuilder_h_
3 
4 #include "KComplexElement.hh"
5 #include "KSGenDirectionSurfaceComposite.h"
6 #include "KSGeneratorsMessage.h"
7 #include "KToolbox.h"
8 #include "KGCore.hh"
9 
10 using namespace Kassiopeia;
11 using namespace KGeoBag;
12 namespace katrin
13 {
14 
15  typedef KComplexElement< KSGenDirectionSurfaceComposite > KSGenDirectionSurfaceCompositeBuilder;
16 
17  template< >
18  inline bool KSGenDirectionSurfaceCompositeBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
19  {
20  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
21  {
22  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KNamed::SetName );
23  return true;
24  }
25  if( aContainer->GetName() == "outside" )
26  {
27  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSGenDirectionSurfaceComposite::SetSide );
28  return true;
29  }
30  if(aContainer->GetName() == "surfaces")
31  {
32  std::vector< KGeoBag::KGSurface* > tSurfaces = KGeoBag::KGInterface::GetInstance()->RetrieveSurfaces( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
33  std::vector< KGeoBag::KGSurface* >::iterator tSurfaceIt;
34  KGeoBag::KGSurface* tSurface;
35 
36  if(tSurfaces.size() == 0) {
37  genmsg(eWarning) << "no surfaces found for specifier <" << aContainer->AsReference<std::string>() << ">" << eom;
38  return false;
39  }
40 
41  for(tSurfaceIt = tSurfaces.begin(); tSurfaceIt != tSurfaces.end(); tSurfaceIt++) {
42  tSurface = *tSurfaceIt;
43  fObject->AddSurface(tSurface);
44  }
45  return true;
46  }
47 
48  if( aContainer->GetName() == "theta" )
49  {
50  fObject->SetThetaValue( KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSGenValue >( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() ) );
51  return true;
52  }
53  if( aContainer->GetName() == "phi" )
54  {
55  fObject->SetPhiValue( KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSGenValue >( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() ) );
56  return true;
57  }
58  return false;
59  }
60 
61  template< >
62  inline bool KSGenDirectionSurfaceCompositeBuilder::AddElement( KContainer* aContainer )
63  {
64  if( aContainer->GetName().substr( 0, 5 ) == "theta" )
65  {
66  aContainer->ReleaseTo( fObject, &KSGenDirectionSurfaceComposite::SetThetaValue );
67  return true;
68  }
69  if( aContainer->GetName().substr( 0, 3 ) == "phi" )
70  {
71  aContainer->ReleaseTo( fObject, &KSGenDirectionSurfaceComposite::SetPhiValue );
72  return true;
73  }
74  return false;
75  }
76 
77 }
78 
79 #endif
